text: Search (Major Feature) : Easily find your files across Direct Messages, Channels and Drive.
Background Notifications (Major Feature): Now available on the Web app, soon on Desktop app. Get alerted even when your Browser is closed. Check out the step-by-step Guide in Settings.
Message Reactions: Add up to 3 emojis per message or item.
Channel Manager+: Upgraded Managers can now promote or revoke other Managers.
